creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: cracked pomegranate revealing seeds at top center, growing out of vertical foliage; smaller pomegranate blossoms at UR; inscription at UL; mounted on cobalt blue
markings: ULC, two relief stamps; on back of mount, bottom center, in pencil: [Shunkin]
medium: Ink and color on mica paper
title: Pomegranate
